title: Smoked chicken Caesar salad
ingredients: ['125 g (4½ oz) day-old bread, cubed', '300 g (10½ oz) cos lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces', '200 g (7 oz) skinned and boned smoked chicken breast, cubed', '25 g (1 oz) Parmesan cheese, grated', 'For the dressing', '1 medium egg', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '2 teaspoons Dijon mustard', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', 'A few drops Tabasco sauce, optional', '½ teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '4 tablespoons low-fat natural yoghurt', 'Salt and black pepper']
